amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to send or otherwise pay for the attendance of more than 50 employees from a Federal department or agency at any single conference occuring outside the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to send or otherwise pay for the attendance of more than 50 employees from a Federal department or agency at any single conference occuring outside the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A057) offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.
